revised_title: Crystallographic Properties of Monoclinic Double Selenates in the Iron Group
tldr: This study investigates the crystallographic properties of monoclinic double selenates in the iron group, confirming the progression of crystal properties with atomic weight and atomic number. The research also reveals that the ammonium salt is isomorphous but not eutropic with the alkali metallic salts, meaning it shares a similar structure but does not have the same properties.
